article.title: ImSAR to Provide Small UAS Radar
article.text: ImSAR LLC, Springville, Utah, was awarded a $98,971,746 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for research and development, rapid advancement and integration of small aperture radars on small unmanned aerial systems. Army Contracting Command, Natick, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity (W911QY-14-D-0007).
